means: 法西斯主义的，法西斯主义者的，法西斯党的

sentence.Network_en: It seemed that anti-Fascist feeling was not being encouraged.
sentence.Network_cn: 看来反法西斯情绪并未受到鼓励。

sentence.Network_en: The German government has outlawed some fascist groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 德国政府已经宣布一些法西斯团体为非法。

sentence.Network_en: This encourages reductionist explanations of fascist ideology.
sentence.Network_cn: 这助长了对法西斯意识形态的简单化解释。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 法西斯（fascist）本义是“束棒”（拉丁语：fasces）的音译，是一根被多根绑在一起的木棍围绕的斧头，在古罗马是权力和威信的标志 …
一些翻译~（转的~） ... fascism 法西斯主义 fascist 法西斯主义者 functionary 工作人员，官员.
有没有文明的上手指南，要讲怎样操作的？ ... Eco Terrorist 生态恐怖分子 Fascist 法西斯分子 Fighter 战斗机.
大学英语精读单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... bunker n. 地堡 fascist a. 法西斯主义的 dictator n. 独裁者.

list.abs: god save the queen her fascist regime ., 上帝拯救女王 , 她的法西斯政权.
The fall of the fascist dictatorship was followed by a left - wing backlash ., 法西斯专政的垮台引起左翼运动的高涨.
Mussolini , Hitler ' s fellow fascist dictator and partner in aggression , had met his end ., 法西斯独裁者 , 希特勒的侵略伙伴墨索里尼已经命归黄泉.
a member of the Italian fascist party before World War II., 二战前 , 意大利法西斯党的成员.

entry.tran: 法西斯主义的;法西斯的
entry.def: You use fascist to describe organizations, ideas, or systems which follow the principles of fascism.

example.ex: ...an upsurge of support for extreme rightist, nationalist and fascist organisations.
example.tran: 一股支持极右团体、民族主义者以及法西斯组织的狂潮
法西斯意识形态的凶险本性

entry.def: If you refer to someone as a fascist, you are expressing disapproval of the fact that they have extreme views on something, and do not tolerate alternative views.

example.ex: ...the so-called health fascists who would meddle in their lives and regulate their calorie intake.
example.tran: 那些可能干涉他们生活、规定他们卡路里摄入量，人称健康法西斯的极端者

means.word_mean: 1. an adherent of fascism or other right-wing authoritarian views
1. relating to or characteristic of fascism;

auth_sentence.content: Its hitherto strong post-fascist political settlement is rapidly weakening.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its hitherto strong post-fascist political settlement is rapidly weakening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its hitherto strong post-fascist political settlement is rapidly weakening.

auth_sentence.content: Rise of fascist "Iron Guard" mass movement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rise of fascist "Iron Guard" mass movement.

auth_sentence.content: British Columbia was fascist... No I didn't.
auth_sentence.res_content: British Columbia was fascist... No I didn't.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: British Columbia was fascist... No I didn't.

sentences.en: They succeeded in overthrowing the fascist dictatorship.
sentences.cn: 他们成功推翻了法西斯独裁统治。

sentences.en: The little girl fell victim to a bomb in a fascist air raid.
sentences.cn: 那个小女孩在一次法西斯空袭中成了一枚炸弹的牺牲者。

sentences.en: an unholy alliance between some Mafiosi and Fascists
sentences.cn: 一些黑手党成员和法西斯分子间的邪恶联盟

sentences.en: Zoya heroically bore the torture that the Fascists inflicted upon her.
sentences.cn: 卓娅英勇地承受法西斯匪徒加在她身上的酷刑。
